code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{logger}from"redux-logger/src";import rootReducer from'./root-reducer';import thunk from"redux-thunk";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";var middlewares=[thunk];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){middlewares.push(logger);}export var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));export var persistor=persistStore(store);// export default {store, persistor};
